label: Financial Spread Betting
description: A type of financial trading where users bet on the movement of financial markets, such as stocks, currencies, and commodities.
intents: Understand the differences between spread betting and other types of financial trading
Find the best spread betting platform

subcategories.label: Stock Market Spread Betting
subcategories.description: Betting on the movement of individual stocks or stock indices.

subcategories.label: Forex Spread Betting
subcategories.description: Betting on the movement of currency pairs.

subcategories.label: Commodity Spread Betting
subcategories.description: Betting on the movement of commodities such as gold, oil, and wheat.

subcategories.label: Sports Spread Betting
subcategories.description: Betting on the outcome of sporting events.

subcategories.label: CFD Trading
subcategories.description: Trading contracts for difference, which allow users to speculate on the price movement of financial instruments without owning the underlying asset.
